column2: Be your own artist, and always be confident in what you're doing. If you're not going to be confident, you might as well not be doing it.
The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you.
If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
Musicians want to be the loud voice for so many quiet hearts.
What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
Music can change the world because it can change people.
You can't knock on opportunity's door and not be ready.
Just as Jesus created wine from water, we humans are capable of transmuting emotion into music.
Until you're ready to look foolish, you'll never have the possibility of being great.
The goal is to try and make the perfect song. Which of course will never happen.
The roughest roads often lead to the top.
A musician should only sound like what they do, and no two musicians sound the same. It's an individual-feel thing, you know?
To some extent I happily don't know what I'm doing. I feel that it's an artist's responsibility to trust that.
The wise musicians are those who play what they can master.
It's like if you want something so badly go out there and grab, just keep on doing it.
Music has healing power. It has the ability to take people out of themselves for a few hours.

Dare to wear the foolish clown face.

Lesser artists borrow, great artists steal.
I believe musicians have a duty, a responsibility to reach out, to share your love or pain with others.
When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.
Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
Life is what happens when you're making other plans.
If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there'd be peace.
You build on failure. Use it as a stepping stone and close the door on the past. Don't try to forget the mistakes, but don't dwell on it.
Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are.
Find someone who has a life that you want and figure out how they got it. Read books, pick your role models wisely. Find out what they did and do it.
Increase your confidence in your self-worth and in your ability to contribute good things to the world.
Musicians don't retire; they stop when there's no more music in them.
All music is folk music. I ain't never heard a horse sing a song.
I would rather write 10,000 notes than a single letter of the alphabet.
Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy. Music is the electrical soil in which the spirit lives, thinks and invents.
One thing I've learned is that I'm not the owner of my talent; I'm the manager of it.

Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.
Beyond a certain point, the music isn't mine anymore. It's yours.
Despite everything, no one can dictate who you are to other people.
You can't give up something you really believe in for financial reasons.
The true beauty of music is that it connects'people. It carries a message, and we, the musicians, are the messengers.
The things that come to those that wait may be the things left by those that got there first.
If you play music with passion and love and honesty, then it will nourish your soul, heal your wounds and make your life worth living. Music is it's own reward.
No matter what happens in life, be good to people. Being good to people is a wonderful legacy to leave behind.

So put your heart and soul into it and give it everything you've got, and more power to you.
I decided long ago never to walk in anyone's shadow; if I fail, or if I succeed at least I did as I believe.
The music is not in the notes, but in the silence between.
